column5: Hey Fred, Hope you made it home safely. Hope to see you up at Mahkwa again in the near future. Have a good one. The guy's in the center table at Mahkwa.
Thanks for the post. We all made it home safe and sound. I got home about 2:45 this morning. We caught our limit of pike and walleye and had a great time doing it! Hope to see you all next year!
